snippet.title: RockFall (SNES) - Gameplay
snippet.description:
Get actual SNES cartridge here: https://www.pikointeractive.com/store.html#!/RockFall-SNES/p/50560386/category=14008401

Rockfall is a Boulderdash clone developed by Paul Lay for the Super Nintendo back in 1995/6, with graphics by Harvey Kong Tin.

It uses the famous Mode 7 feature to zoom when you collect a crystal, rotate when you complete a level, and to rotate during the game and have all the rocks fall in the opposite direction.

It has 6 different levels, the game increases difficulty and complexity as you pass the levels along.
